subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After firing Coach Lawrence Frank, the Nets lost again and joined the 1988 Heat and the 1999 Clippers for worst start to an N.B.A. season.
snippet: After firing Coach Lawrence Frank, the Nets lost again and joined the 1988 Heat and the 1999 Clippers for worst start to an N.B.A. season.
